title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
description: When switching perspectives in the application, the CVS repository view is no longer maximized. A view that is maximized should stay maximized.
OB: The CVS repository view should remain maximized when switching perspectives.
EB: The CVS repository view is no longer maximized after switching perspectives.
SR: Ensure that the CVS repository view maintains its maximized state when switching perspectives.
